import React , {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Modal , Form , Row ,Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import urls from './../routes' import axios from 'axios' export default function MyVerticallyCenteredModal(props) { const [currentState , setCurrentSa ] = useState({ signup:false , login:true }) const [userVal , setUserVal] = useState({ name:"" , email:"" , password:"" , mobile:"" }) const onchangehandler =(e) =>{ setUserVal({ ...userVal ,[e.target.name]:e.target.value }) console.log(e.target.name , ">>>>" ,e.target.value ); } return ( { console.log(urls) }

setCurrentSa({ signup:false , login:true }) } className={currentState.login===true? " text-success text-decoration-underline " : "" } > Login

setCurrentSa({ signup:true , login:false })} className={currentState.signup===true ?"text-success text-decoration-underline " :" "} > Signup

{ currentState.login===true ? {/* Password */}
:
} ); }
